title: I have never seen New Zealand as comprehensively outplayed as they were by England - the score didn't reflect their dominance
text:
It's no exaggeration to say that England's remarkable win over New Zealand was one of the best games of rugby I have ever seen. In my opinion it was comfortably England's best performance of the professional era, and I'm still stunned by the way this extraordinary game unfolded. I had predicted England to win by five, but they utterly dominated the game in a way that wasn't reflected on the scoreboard.

In a lifetime of watching the All Blacks I've seen them beaten plenty of times, but I have never seen them so comprehensively outplayed. It is all the more remarkable because this is an excellent New Zealand side, but it floundered because the players so rarely find themselves in this position...
description: It's no exaggeration to say that England's remarkable win over New Zealand was one of the best games of rugby I have ever seen.
